panels.description:
**voting:** your node has caught up and actively voting  
**delinquent:** your node is far behind cluster. Maybe after restart, network failure, or any other performance problems.

**All:** count of your leader slost for current epoch  
**Done:** count of your processed leader slots  
**Skipped:** slots where no blocks were produced  
**Skip rate:** % of skipped slots from slots done  
**Time to next:** time until next leader slot  
part of this information comes from `solana block-production -u l | grep  <your identity public key>`

targets.query: SELECT ("fields_slots_skipped"  *100/ "fields_slots_done") as skip_perc FROM "autogen"."validators_info" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("host" = '$node1')
